name: Robin
supported_languages: English, German, French, Dutch, Korean, Russian, Spanish, Ukrainian

name: AlphaNet
misc_notes: most views are web-views of Alpha

name: Chimp
user_search: YES (not only by user name but also for content in their bio)

name: Felix
user_search: YES (not only by user name but also for content in their bio)
1password_integration: YES (open links in 1Password, set 1Password as default browser)

name: Netbot
private_messages: YES (no initiating of group messages (taking part works though), no push for PMs)
read_later_services_integration: YES (bitly Pro, Instapaper, Pinboard, Pocket, Readability)

name: Patter for iOS
misc_notes: a client dedicated to private messages and Patter

name: Climber
misc_notes: a client for posting 11 second long videos to app.net

name: Screenfeeder
misc_notes: a client for reading Twitter, ADN, Facebook, Instagram, Foursquare, Dribble. Shows 1 post per screen and updates in an interval to show the next post. Kind of a personal twitterwall

name: DotDot
private_patter_rooms: YES (Can read and write to existing, but not create)
push_notifications: YES (Toast notifications, granular for mentions and PMs)
misc_notes: Shows recent threads, and supports SkyDrive for photo uploads

name: Kiwi
private_messages: YES (can't initiate group messages, participation possible though)

name: Sail
misc_notes: a client that only can do posting but nothing else

name: SNABB
misc_notes: a client that only can do posting but nothing else

name: Project Amy
misc_notes: a Messages.app-plug-in which integrates ADN-channels into Messages

name: Spinnaker
misc_notes:
a client that only can do posting but nothing else
Open Source

name: Japper.org
platform: XMPP-bridge to be used in Jabber-clients
